synopsis.text: Drawing inspiration from the whimsical illustrations of director Takashi Taniguchi, the comedic genius Pikotarou weaves three-minute fairy tales in an improvised and captivating manner. Known by his stage name, Kazuhito 'Daimaou' Kosaka, Pikotarou breathes life into beloved classics like The Little Match Girl and Little Red Riding Hood, visiting their protagonists and presenting the tales as bedtime stories. In this unique anime, Pikotarou showcases his versatility by voicing not only himself but every character in the show, promising an unforgettable and delightfully absurd experience.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
